TopicTitle: Stepping Softly: Landing on the Destructable VAB

Articles.Content:
A simple challange to test your piloting skills:

Put as large a rocket as you can safely down on the VAB Helipad, without destroying the VAB. (destroying the launch pad is fine)

Destructable buildings must be on. Any part mod is allowed. (no hyperedit, of course)

Scorred by the mass of the vessel on top of the VAB with throttle off.

Scoreboard:

1) Rakaydos- 50.9 tons.
